definition.para: Name of the photographer or firm, artist, or architect associated with the creation of the original image.

instructions.para: This field to be used only if the entry in the Photographer field does not represent the original creator of the image.
This field should represent as closely as possible the creator’s name or the company’s name at the time of the creation of the original image.
Includes both personal and corporate names.
Input Lastname, Firstname for all personal names. Use LC Authority File for form of name, if available.

history.justification: Special Collections found that distinguishing the original creator was needed so frequently that we created a property for it.

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation.
